application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of side and rear roof extensions to the house and two roof lights on the front roof slope
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (910.01, 910.02, 910.03, Design & access statement Received: 25/06/2021; 910.05-A, 910.06-A Received: 20/09/2021; 910.04-A Received: 22/09/2021) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the side dormer shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
Condition : 6 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.
